description: Listed Building application relating to works to the lower 4 floors, (Ground, 1st, 2nd + 3rd) in connection with formation of 15 residential units. Planning application ref P120327 for permission for the change of use to residential and for the conversion to 15 units also submitted. PLEASE NOTE; REVISED PLANS RECEIVED This application may affect the setting of a listed building.  Town and Country Planning (Listed Building and Conservation Areas) Act 1990 (as amended); Section 67.
